html:
1.11.21  5:14 am   It seems like you are shouting when you are doing stuff in all caps. I can even hear the shouting. Are you doing this for a purpose?

      sometimes caps can be used for a bit of emphasis. not actual shouting

1.11.21  4:12 am   Do you think there is more then 1 person in the world?

      yes

1.11.21  3:02 am   are you proud of the outro to Slow Down? I think it's one of the most beautiful things you've ever written and one of the most beautiful things I've ever heard

      yikes, kindperson

1.11.21  3:00 am   Bill I've been reading your posts and I'm pretty sure you're either A. A space alien, B. some sort of higher dimensional being, C. The immortal living god-king of some ancient civilization long lost to the literal and metaphorical sands, or D. All of the above. Which is it?

     none

     What are you?

     a person

     Can my feeble human brain even comprehend your origin?

     sure

     Also can you play reggaeton?

     yes

1.11.21  2:39 am   I am very excited for your new video, on a scale of 12.3 to 1.7 how excited are you for your next video?

      average. it is an average video

1.11.21  1:42 am   why is music your passion?

      why am i its passion

1.11.21  1:37 am   how are u so swag

      by following every rule and regulation

1.11.21  12:35 am   your genuine passion for what you do inspires me daily. thank you for that!  how do you keep that passion after all this time, especially on projects that take a lot out of you? 

      it's raining ideas. just trying not to drown in all of them

1.11.21  12:07 am   Why does slow down have the best ending of any song yet written?

      to Keep You Coming Back For More

1.10.21  11:20 pm   do you name your layers or edit in chaos?

      naming layers seems way more chaotic than not naming them, in which case they will probably be automatically named with some kind of number scheme, in the order they were created

1.10.21  11:02 pm   do you remember the lyrics to all of ur songs?

      no but i can retrieve them pretty easily

1.10.21  10:43 pm   when will you make a new video?

      all the time

1.10.21  9:49 pm   Me and my friends where talking and one of them asked what genre you would be in. What genre do you consider yourself?

     regular

      Much love bye and sorry if someone already asked this

1.10.21  9:16 pm   Why wouldn't you rather make a big project than just make a vid saying about making a big project

      fuck big projects

1.10.21  8:46 pm   bill you've been using too many capital letters recently.

     i think i've always used them the same amount, which i think is a reasonable amount

     are you okay?

      are you

1.10.21  8:05 pm   Since the odds of other life forms exsisting in this universe are very high, and the odds that those life forms may also have way more advanced technology than us are also somewhere, what do you think the chances of us humans, or just everything as we know it in general, is just a simulation?

      of what

1.10.21  8:01 pm   Will you ever release an album?

      i think the songs will be better if i release them individually

1.10.21  7:32 pm   what's a question you have about the universe?

      is it big

1.10.21  6:47 pm   What is your favorite music note

      that all depends on what and when the previous note was

1.10.21  6:33 pm   Is life real?

     yes

     show your work

      you already did. a question is a sign of life

1.10.21  6:28 pm   Hey bud. It's been what you might call a "real shithouse time to exist in my life" for the past time and a bit. But ur music still somehow always makes me have pleasant emotions that cut thru the numbness and that's really Cool and nobody else's music does that. So thanks very much I appreciate you and your music for existing and being nice 

      holy lifepath you are very friendly

1.10.21  5:46 pm   Why do we even exist

      no one could figure out how not to

1.10.21  5:36 pm   I am not good at learning anything how do i learn how to do things

      do it first, then learn how you did it, from experience

1.10.21  5:29 pm   Do you ever think you are going to do more reality videos?

     of course

     I notice the last one was during the production of HotEW,IG so are there more that you have that you just haven't released

     tens of thousands. it's not that they are not released, it's that they are not edited

     or are you at a point where they're so far back in time jumping this far forward might not be worth it?

     i would never do that. i would pick up where they left off. you will possibly never see entirely current content on that page, because it actually makes for stronger editing and more meaningful foreshadowing if some time has passed before editing, so i know which bits would be most meaningful to pick. so far, only about 1% of what i wish was on there, is on there

1.10.21  4:39 pm   What's the song "Might quit" about?

      it seems to have themes of independence, finding your way in the world, etc

1.10.21  4:39 pm   What is your favorite chord type? Major, Minor, Augmented, Half-Diminished Seventh in Third Inversion, etc.?

      to make music you gotta change the chords. and it turns out, music is actually the whole reason i use chords

1.10.21  3:57 pm   Have you considered investing in a drum kit?

      they usually go down in value. i know because i own one

1.10.21  3:36 pm   how do you deal with undecisiveness

      i'm not sure

1.10.21  3:35 pm   Pepperoni pizza or cheeseburger?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but, pepperoni cheeseburger?

1.10.21  3:34 pm   Why can't I ever stick with a project

     because you have too many good projects

     I try to write something and I have a great idea but then getting the words down is hard and then by the time I've thought of a goood way to write it I think of another idea and the previous one becomes really boring

     you're going to have to start doing them faster

1.10.21  3:16 pm   what shape should a computer be

      person shaped

1.10.21  3:03 pm   Why is your grammar so good? I've never seen a typo in any of your answers here

      i'm potentially a member of the clergy

1.10.21  2:43 pm   sometimes i write a song so good that i think "i should stop writing songs after this, because i will never outdo myself." but then i remember that 3 years ago i wrote a song that i thought could never be superseded, but then i did. so i guess the trick is to just stop thinking? And just do it?

     sometimes that could be useful, but it can be hard to do, especially if you've already started thinking about it

     is "just do it" a philosophy that you agree with?

      sort of, but, if it's a philosophy that means you might have already started thinking about it

1.10.21  2:14 pm   What's something you're proud of?

      the calendar

1.10.21  2:12 pm   Do you think the body has an influence on the behavior of a person more than the brain does? For example: You have an important exam and you have to study for it. Your mind is motivated enough to put effort in it but the moment you start reading, your body feels uncomfortable and you'd start feeling sleepy but at the same time you have in mind that you gotta study for said exam. So in the end which one is superior, The mind or the body?  

      the brain is part of the body

1.10.21  1:54 pm   what's your favorite chord

     one weird trick is to change the chords

     and why is it C#dim7b5?

     could be in the key of G and singing a B note just before singing an A note on D7sus4

1.10.21  1:04 pm   what's the best way to start a conversation?

      'hey guys, welcome to this conversation'

1.10.21  12:57 pm   which artists do you take inspiration from?

      could be you

1.10.21  12:41 pm   what shape are decisions?

      it's like a fork

1.10.21  12:25 pm   Did I ask a question a while back?

     maybe

     If so where is it now? 

     it could be

1.10.21  11:51 am   why do we remember some dreams and not others?

      some of them take place in an entirely different universe, so there is absolutely no way to connect it to your waking universe in anyway

1.10.21  11:43 am   How do you read music on sheet paper?

      you can tell what the notes are from where the dots are, and when the notes are from how the stems, flags, and beams are configured

1.10.21  11:12 am   What do you think about sweet potatoes?

      not sweet enough

1.10.21  10:42 am   why is purple not orange and why does green look angry

      perhaps you are having some kind of an episode

1.10.21  10:23 am   are you going to release a new video/song in the next month?

     yes

     because I saw that you posted on twitter and instagram. no pressure tho! :D

1.10.21  10:09 am   Are you making a video 

      yes but the important thing to remember is, i am making another one after that

1.10.21  8:48 am   what time is it

      regular time

1.10.21  8:47 am   How did you learn to play music using a keyboard? Did you start by trying to play what you heard, or did you create a system by which you "learned the piano" with steps?

      i've been using keyboards my entire life. so i've probably done a lot of things. even as far back as i can remember, i've always readily known 'how to play music.' the only questions is always just how do i do it even more. and i've been through many schemes of that nature, over the years, and still to this day

1.10.21  8:35 am   how do I do something I don't want to do?

      first, figure out why you are doing it. that might determine where you'll get the energy from, and how much

1.10.21  7:14 am   what type of music do u like? 

      post office
